summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing shipping charges for various shipments made in July 2005. It includes information about transportation and special handling charges, discounts, and payment due dates.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the primary account holder for the FedEx services detailed in the invoice, with multiple shipments listed under his name.

persons.name: Janusz Banasiak
persons.context: Janusz Banasiak is mentioned as a sender for some of the packages shipped to Jeffrey E. Epstein.

connections.description: Janusz Banasiak is sending packages on behalf of Jeffrey E. Epstein, indicating a working relationship.

events.title: FedEx Invoice Issued
events.description: FedEx issued an invoice to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered in July 2005.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022

keyFacts: The total amount due on the invoice is $191.50.
The invoice includes charges for transportation and special handling.
Multiple shipments were made by Jeffrey E. Epstein during July 2005.
Janusz Banasiak is involved in sending packages to Epstein.
The invoice indicates a payment due date of August 2, 2005.
